channel.title: [Project Insanity]Give Points command[Project Insanity]
channel.description:
err, i need a command that gives another player points. easy but i'm having major brain shits. sorry and thanks in advance here is was i got so far(excuse the conventions)
[code] if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("give20fp")) { something get player id idk... something write players file +20fp [/code]
